mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_ID , B.TITLE , B.CONTENT , B.CRT_DT , B.VIEW_COUNT , B.VIDEO_PATH , B.POSTER_PATH , B.BOARD_DIVISION , B.URL_ADDRESS , B.RECOMMEND_COUNT , B.EMAIL , M.NAME , M.NICKNAME , M.PASSWORD , M.SALT , M.PROFILE_IMG , M.LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT , M.MEMBER_AUTHORITY , M.LOGIN_FAIL_TIME FROM BOARD B , MEMBER M WHERE B.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND B.EMAIL = M.EMAIL

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BOARD B , MEMBER M WHERE B.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND B.BOARD_DIVISION = #{boardDivision}
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT B.BOARD_ID , B.TITLE , B.CONTENT , B.CRT_DT , B.VIEW_COUNT , B.VIDEO_PATH , B.POSTER_PATH , B.BOARD_DIVISION , B.URL_ADDRESS , B.RECOMMEND_COUNT , B.EMAIL , M.NAME , M.NICKNAME , M.PASSWORD , M.SALT , M.PROFILE_IMG , M.LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT , M.MEMBER_AUTHORITY , M.LOGIN_FAIL_TIME FROM BOARD B , MEMBER M WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 AND B.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND B.BOARD_DIVISION = 0 ORDER BY B.CRT_DT DESC
